RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 40. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ONE RICH KITTEN stalked the pace from three wide through the turn, moved to engage the leader at the top of the lane, dueled with the pacesetter down the stretch, was bumped by that one several times and prevailed in a drive. MOBIL MEMORY raced up the fence to set a pressured early pace, shook off the presser in the turn, was engaged at the quarter pole by the winner, dueled with that one through the lane while getting out, bumped the winner several times in deep stretch, was out-finished late in a game effort. CANELA FINA rallied up the rail inside several rivals into the turn to be prominent turning for home and failed to sustain the bid while best of the rest. MOST ADORABLE rushed up through the pack down the backside to be threatening from four wide in the turn and finished evenly. SISSY'S MAY slow early to be at the rear of the field and showed late interest in the lane with a mild bid. UNEXPECTEDVALENTYN went one-paced and failed to menace. SHE'S A BIG GIRL shuffled a bit at the start, angled eight wide down the backside shortly away from the gate and was never a threat. MOTOWN HARBOR trailed most of the way and passed weaker rivals in the lane. CABARET FLEUR flashed speed for a quarter mile to be on the pace and came up empty in the turn. BOLD NICKY raced three wide down the backstretch in mid-pack and weakened having bled.

ENTRY.NAME: Mobil Memory
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, dueled, lugged out, bumped stretch, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Canela Fina
ENTRY.COMMENT: rally inside turn, failed to sustain bid, best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Most Adorable
ENTRY.OWNER: Yoder Susan and Rivera Alan Yahir

ENTRY.NAME: She's a Big Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: shuffled start, raced wide, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: One Rich Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3w, bid, bumped late, prevailed, driving

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 5F Dirt CR: 54. Maiden Special Weight Purse 24300. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SOCIALBUTTERFLYTAM pressed the pace to the turn, rallied from between horses to take the lead turning for home and cleared off in the lane. KACHOW raced off to a clear early lead along the fence, responded when challenged by rivals in the turn and kept on gamely through the lane to hold the place. QUALIFICATA took an awkward step leaving the gate to be last in the field, rushed up four wide into the turn to loom boldly at the quarter pole and failed to sustain the rally in the lane. KATERYNA trailed to the turn, angled six wide at the head of the lane and made a mild late bid. SHE'S WICKED chased the leaders from five wide through the turn and failed to gain ground. BIG R. NAUFFAL raced prominently in the early going, dropped back along the fence into the turn and never threatened.

ENTRY.NAME: Big R. Nauffal
ENTRY.COMMENT: prominent early, dropped back, saved ground, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Qualificata
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start, rushed up 4 wide, loomed, even late

ENTRY.NAME: Kateryna
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, angled 6 wide, mild late bid

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 19500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 21 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JOSH'N tracked the leaders into the turn from the fence, angled out three wide turning for home and made a steady advance to be clear late in the drive. STARS N SPACE broke outward bumping rival at start, moved up to press the pace from two wide to the turn, took command to open a clear lead on the bend, could not hold off the winner down the lane and finished willingly to be second best. MIXTER JENSEN showed early speed to set the pace from the rail to the turn, was overtaken at the tree-eighths pole and kept on well to hold the show. IMA BELIEVER reserved off the early pace, cut the corner turning for home and showed late interest in the lane. AWESOMELY INSPIRED prompted the pace from three wide through the turn and weakened in the stretch. TEQUILA FLATS made a brief rally in the turn from between horses and failed to sustain the rally. MATTHEW'S PATRIOT rallied seven wide into the turn and flattened out. RED COMET bumped at the start from the inside, ducked out to be wide down the backside and never menaced. DANCE MOVES was never a threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Josh'n
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked, circled 3w, steady advance, clear late

ENTRY.NAME: Stars N Space
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out start, pressed pace, clear lead, couldn't hold, 2d best

ENTRY.NAME: Red Comet
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, wide backstretch, never menaced

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 10900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE OCTOBER 21. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KOSCIUSZKO broke alertly to set the pace from the gate, opened a clear advantage in the turn, shook off a bid from the runner-up in upper stretch and drew off down the lane as much best. BROADWAY JONES stalked the leader into the turn from three wide, made a bid turning for home to loom up at the top of the lane but could not go with the winner despite a good effort. MAXIMIZER prompted the early pace from the fence, angled out down the lane to be three wide and kept on willingly. CALL WEST trailed in the early going, angled out to be six wide down the backstretch, circled the field turning for home to be well wide in the lane and made a mild late rally. KINGOFTHEBUCKEYE raced up the rail to make a brief bid turning for home and flattened out. DUEL FUEL was never a threat. POWER SONG prominently placed to be well positioned to the turn and gave way coming home.

ENTRY.NAME: Maximizer
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, inside, angled out stretch, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Broadway Jones
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, bid, loomed, not enough

ENTRY.NAME: Kosciuszko
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, set pace, responded, drew off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 76. Allowance Purse 36200. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 21 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less NotConsider ed In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BUCKEYE PRINCESS crowded at the start to be near the back of the field, circled four wide in the turn to mount a strong rally, closed well in the lane to engage the leader in mid-stretch and drew off to the wire as much best. NEAR PERFECT stalked the pace through the turn from three wide, rallied well down the lane to be up late for the place. ANCHORWOMAN sped off to the lead opening a clear advantage, responded when called upon turning for home and weakened late in the stretch. IN TROUBLED WATERS well placed stalking the pace from three wide to the head of the lane and failed to gain ground. DRIVEN FOR SUCCESS tracked the pace from the rail and lacked a late response. I'M LEGIT slow early to trail and showed late interest rallying along the fence in the lane. SERGER chased the leaders while racing wide down the backstretch and failed to mount a rally. STEALTH MODE went evenly as a non-threat. FACTISIMFLASHY prompted the pace from three wide to the head of the lane and stopped in the stretch. COSTUME JEWELRY was never a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Anchorwoman
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Stealth Mode
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Driven for Success
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, rail trip, no late response

ENTRY.NAME: Near Perfect
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, finished well, up for place

ENTRY.NAME: Buckeye Princess
ENTRY.COMMENT: crowded start, circled 4w, closed well, drew off, much best

ENTRY.NAME: In Troubled Waters
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, 3 wide, failed to gain

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 87. Claiming Purse 17600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 21 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000 (Races Where Entered For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Pr eferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MALIBU CLASSIC stalked the pace through the turn, rallied five wide at the head of the lane and wore his rivals down through the stretch to be up in time. TIME HEIST tracked the pace from the fence, saved all the ground cutting the corner turning for home and finished willingly up the rail to just miss. AMIGO'S AFFAIR sped up the fence to take the lead, kept a clear lead turning for home, dug-in gamely when challenged in the lane and couldn't last in deep stretch. GEHRIG prompted the pace through the turn, loomed up at the head of the lane and flattened out in the stretch. K P SILVER BULLET tracked the pace from five wide, was set to an early drive and failed to respond. LAZARUS PROJECT unhurried in the early going to be near the rear of the field and mounted a mild late rally down the lane. MAKING ME CRAZY was well placed for a half mile and tired. NO COMMISSION was never a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Time Heist
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, saved ground, closed willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Malibu Classic
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, circled 5 wide, wore rivals down, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Gehrig
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, loomed 3 wide, flattened out,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 86. Starter Allowance Purse 17600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 21 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JOLIE RULER prompted the pace to the top of the lane, engaged the leader in upper stretch and prevailed in the stretch duel to the wire. LATER DAYS broke alertly to set the pace, responded when challenged turning for home and was out-finished late in the lane. TEAM GOLD DIGGER trailed early, exchanged bump with rival into turn, took up briefly, saved ground through the turn, angled out for the drive and closed well belatedly. SUPORB stalked the leaders to be well placed at the quarter pole in striking distance and failed to gain in the stretch. QUEENOFCATNIPHILL reserved off the pace at the back down the backside, exchanged bumps in the turn, angled four wide to rally in the turn and flattened out coming home. GRAN MAMIBELLA flashed brief speed to be prominent early, dropped back in the turn and finished evenly.

ENTRY.NAME: Team Gold Digger
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump turn, saved ground, angled out, closed belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Queenofcatniphill
ENTRY.OWNER: Kahlden Lawrence A and Wiener Brett

ENTRY.NAME: Jolie Ruler
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, bid 3 wide, dueled, prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Later Days
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, set pace, responded, outfinished late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 56. Allowance Purse 33700. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 21 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Consider ed In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KAT TRAX stalked the pace from the fence through the turn, angled out turning for home and wore down the pacesetter in a determined drive. DOLCE MARIE sped to the lead to open a clear advantage on the turn, held a clear lead in mid-stretch and could not hold off the winner deep in the lane while clearly second best. RATATAT tracked the pace from three wide in the turn, made a bid turning for home and failed to gain ground down the stretch. MANDOLIN BREEZE reserved off the pace early, circled five wide in the turn and closed mildly in the lane. MY TWO JAKES prominently placed between horses into the turn, lost position on the bend and came on again mildly up the fence. GHOSTLY REVIVAL never menaced at any time. HALO EFFECT prompted the early pace and faded in the turn. DESDEMONA KAY broke a step slow and trailed as a non-factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Kat Trax
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, angled out, determined drive

ENTRY.NAME: My Two Jakes
ENTRY.COMMENT: prominent between, dropped back, came again inside, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Dolce Marie
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed, clear lead, couldn't hold, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Halo Effect
ENTRY.OWNER: Yoder Susan D and Yoder Lori D

ENTRY.NAME: Ratatat
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 3 wide, bid, failed to gain

ENTRY.NAME: Mandolin Breeze
ENTRY.OWNER: Emerson Equistions LLC and Bestard Brian
